setting.title: Workspace member settings
setting.roleDesc: Promoting to Manager means that this member can invite other members create groups etc. However only Masters have access to edit payment and Workspace profile settings.
setting.givePlansDesc: Allocate plans for your new Workspace members.

message.updateFail: Failed to update member details from the Workspace please try again later

kick.title: Remove member from Workspace
kick.desc: The selected members are removed from your workspace. They are no longer be able to use Workspace-related products and services. Removed members can be invited again.

message.kickFail: Failed to remove Workspace member please try again later

add.title: Add Workspace member
add.desc: Would you like other users to use VIRNECT products and services together?
add.desc3: Purchase plans in advance from "Purchase plans" and allocate them to your new members. You may purchase plans later after they have joined your Workspace.
add.emailDesc: Please enter the email address of the person you want to invite and send an invitation. By accepting your invitation the member can become one of your Workspace member and use VIRNECT Products together.

message.inviteFail: Failed to invite a member to Workspace please try again later
message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated when inviting new workspace members.
message.enoughPlan: No plans available to assign to Workspace members please purchase plans and invite them again.
message.memberOverflow: Please note that total of 9 users including the "Master" member may participate the "Public service" with the Basic plan. Please change your plans if you need more members to use our products and services.
message.workspaceOverflow: In Public Service one user can participate in up to 9 Workspaces. To join the selected Workspace please make yourself available first by leaving one of the Workspace you are in and request an invitation email to the Workspace master member.
message.memberAlready: This member is already being participated in your workspace.
message.noHavePlans: There are no remaining plans available. Please go to the payment center and purchase the plans.
